text: Markus Naglestad (born 26 April 1991) is a Norwegian footballer who currently plays for Hartford Athletic in the USL Championship. == Career == Naglestad started his career as a youth at Våg. He had a short spell with IK Start in 2006. He featured for Våg in the 3. divisjon – the 4th tier of Norwegian football – in 2009 and 2010. As a 19-year-old, he moved to the US for studies. There he was voted both East Coast Conference Men's Soccer Offensive Player of the Year, and Rookie of the Year, by the league's coaches after his first season out of two seasons with Bridgeport Purple Knights of the NCAA Division II. He then spent two seasons with Providence Friars of NCAA Division I, before being drafted by New York City of Major League Soccer on 20 January 2015, but failed to sign a contract due to a knee injury. On 9 November 2018, Naglestad signed with Egersunds IK for the 2019 season.Markus Naglestad klar for EIK, eikfotball.no, 9 November 2019 In August 2020 he signed with Hartford Athletic of the USL Championship.https://www.hartfordathletic.com/news_article/show/1117550 == Career statistics == {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !rowspan="2"|Season !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Division !colspan="2"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Total |- !Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |2015 |rowspan="1" valign="center"|Gjøvik-Lyn |rowspan="2" valign="center"|2. divisjon |26||26||3||2||29||28 |- |2016 |rowspan="1" valign="center"|Fram Larvik |24||25||2||1||26||26 |- |2017 |rowspan="1" valign="center"|Sandefjord |rowspan="1" valign="center"|Eliteserien |6||0||0||0||6||0 |- |2017 |rowspan="1" valign="center"|HamKam |rowspan="3" valign="center"|2. divisjon |8||9||0||0||8||9 |- |2018 |rowspan="1" valign="center"|Hødd |25||13||4||2||29||15 |- |2019 |rowspan="1" valign="center"|Egersund |26||25||2||1||28||26 |- |2020 |rowspan="1" valign="center"|Hartford |rowspan="1" valign="center"|USL Championship |8||1||0||0||8||1 |- !colspan="3"|Career Total !123!!99!!11!!6!!134!!105 |} ==References== == External links == * Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Norwegian footballers Category:Norwegian expatriate footballers Category:Providence Friars men's soccer players Category:AC Connecticut players Category:Sandefjord Fotball players Category:Norwegian expatriate sportspeople in the United States Category:Expatriate soccer players in the United States Category:New York City FC draft picks Category:USL League Two players Category:Eliteserien players Category:Hamarkameratene players Category:IL Hødd players Category:Egersunds IK players Category:Hartford Athletic players Category:2. divisjon players Category:Association football forwards
